data.eml:eml: One new species of the subgenus Hexatoma (Eriocera) Macquart (Diptera, Limoniidae) from China with a key to Chinese species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Men, Qiu-Lei, Yu, Dao-Ping (2015): One new species of the subgenus Hexatoma (Eriocera) Macquart (Diptera, Limoniidae) from China with a key to Chinese species. ZooKeys 477: 157-171, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.477.7570, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.477.7570
